FuncNodeÂ¶

struct asmjit::FuncNode
#include <compiler.h>

Function declaration node.

Functions are base blocks for generating assembler output. Each generated assembler stream needs standard entry and leave sequences which are compatible with the operating system ABI.

FuncNode can be used to generate function prolog and epilog which are compatible with a given function calling convention and to allocate and manage variables that can be allocated/spilled during compilation phase.

Public Functions

FuncNode(BaseCompiler * compiler)

Create a new FuncNode instance.

Note
Always use asmjit::BaseCompiler::addFunc() to create a FuncNode instance.

~FuncNode()

Destroy the FuncNode instance.

TargetNode * getEntryNode()

Get function entry TargetNode.

TargetNode * getExitNode()

Get function exit TargetNode.

Label getEntryLabel()

Get function entry label.

Label getExitLabel()

Get function exit label.

EndNode * getEnd()

Get function EndNode.

FuncDecl * getDecl()

Get function declaration.

VarData ** getArgList()

Get arguments list.

uint32_t getArgCount()

Get arguments count.

VarData * getArg(uint32_t i)

Get argument at i.

void setArg(uint32_t i, VarData * vd)

Set argument at i.

void resetArg(uint32_t i)

Reset argument at i.

uint32_t getFuncHints()

Get function hints.

uint32_t getFuncFlags()

Get function flags.

bool hasFuncFlag(uint32_t flag)

Get whether the _funcFlags has flag.

void addFuncFlags(uint32_t flags)

Set function flag.

void clearFuncFlags(uint32_t flags)

Clear function flag.

bool isNaked()

Get whether the function is naked.

bool isCaller()

Get whether the function is also a caller.

bool isStackMisaligned()

Get whether the required stack alignment is lower than expected one, thus it has to be aligned manually.

bool isStackAdjusted()

Get whether the stack pointer is adjusted inside function prolog/epilog.

bool isFinished()

Get whether the function is finished.

uint32_t getExpectedStackAlignment()

Get expected stack alignment.

void setExpectedStackAlignment(uint32_t alignment)

Set expected stack alignment.

uint32_t getRequiredStackAlignment()

Get required stack alignment.

void setRequiredStackAlignment(uint32_t alignment)

Set required stack alignment.

void updateRequiredStackAlignment()

Update required stack alignment so it’s not lower than expected stack alignment.

uint32_t getRedZoneSize()

Set stack “Red Zone” size.

void setRedZoneSize(uint32_t s)

Get stack “Red Zone” size.

uint32_t getSpillZoneSize()

Set stack “Spill Zone” size.

void setSpillZoneSize(uint32_t s)

Get stack “Spill Zone” size.

uint32_t getArgStackSize()

Get stack size used by function arguments.

uint32_t getMemStackSize()

Get stack size used by variables and memory allocated on the stack.

uint32_t getCallStackSize()

Get stack size used by function calls.

void mergeCallStackSize(uint32_t s)

Merge stack size used by function call with s.

void setHint(uint32_t hint, uint32_t value)

Set function hint.

uint32_t getHint(uint32_t hint)

Get function hint.

Public Members

TargetNode * _entryNode

Function entry.

TargetNode * _exitNode

Function exit.

FuncDecl * _decl

Function declaration.

EndNode * _end

Function end.

VarData ** _argList

Arguments list as VarData.

uint32_t _funcHints

Function hints;.

uint32_t _funcFlags

Function flags.

uint32_t _expectedStackAlignment

Expected stack alignment (we depend on this value).

Note
It can be global alignment given by the OS or described by an target platform ABI.

uint32_t _requiredStackAlignment

Required stack alignment (usually for multimedia instructions).

uint16_t _redZoneSize

The “Red Zone” suze - count of bytes which might be accessed without adjusting the stack pointer.

uint16_t _spillZoneSize

Spill zone size (zone used by WIN64ABI).

uint32_t _argStackSize

Stack size needed for function arguments.

uint32_t _memStackSize

Stack size needed for all variables and memory allocated on the stack.

uint32_t _callStackSize

Stack size needed to call other functions.

Private Functions

FuncNode(const FuncNode & other)

FuncNode & operator=(const FuncNode & other)
